body.p: Below you can download a number of spellchecker extensions for LibreOffice. Please note that these extensions are beta releases for the time being.

The extensions are built using HFST — specifically hfst-ospell (source code) — and Voikko, and specifically the LibreOffice-voikko extension (below shortened to LO-voikko) (source code). The spellers here are a direct application of the normative fst used as a spelling checker (in combination with an error model to create suggestions).

This is work in progress, and there are several open issues still to be worked out. Although the available spellers and extensions should work fine for the specified LibreOffice versions, please bear with us and report any issues you find to feedback@divvun.no
body.note: In honour of the contributions by Tommi Pirinen to make these LibreOffice spell checkers come through, this download page was made public on the day of Tommi's public defense for his PhD on using Weighted Finite State technologies in spell checkers, February 28, 2014.

body.note: Universal binaries and LibreOffice on the Mac: As of LibreOffice 4.2, it is available both as a 64 bit and a 32 bit version, defaulting to the 64-bit version in most cases. Please note that the 64-bit version of LibreOffice needs to be restarted after you have installed the LO-voikko extension before it is activated. Also note that the 64 bit version of LibreOffice requires MacOSX 10.8 or newer.
